tool.name: Tombo plot genome locations
tool.description: Plotting amperage signal from nanopore reads at the locations specified
tool.command:
mkdir -p ./fast5/ && mkdir -p ./fast5s_control/ &&
#if $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar': tar -xf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5/ && #elif $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.gz': tar -xzf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5/ && #elif $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.bz2': tar -xjf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5/ && #end if
#if $include_control.include_control_bool: #if $control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar': tar -xf '$control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #elif $control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.gz': tar -xzf '$control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #elif $control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.bz2': tar -xjf '$control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #end if #end if
tombo plot genome_locations --fast5-basedir ./fast5/ #if $include_control.include_control_bool: --control-fast5-basedirs ./fast5s_control/ #end if --genome-locations '$genome_locations' --pdf-filename '$output' '$model_type' --overplot-threshold '$overplot_threshold' --overplot-type '$overplot_type' --num-bases '$num_bases' --corrected-group '$corrected_group'

param.name: include_control_bool
param.label: Plot control samples? (samples with only canonical nucleotides)

param.name: genome_locations
param.label: Genomic locations at which to plot signal.
param.help: Format locations as "chrm:position[:strand] [chrm2:position2[:strand2] ...]" (strand not applicable for all applications)

param.name: overplot_type
param.label: Method for handling locations with coverage above --overplot-threshold

tool.help: Plot amperage signal of nanopore reads in specified regions
